name: The 9th Int’l Conference on Creative Education
content: The 9th Int’l Conference on Creative Education (CCE 2023) will be held during Oct. 27-29, 2023 in Xi'an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Creative Education. The aim of CCE 2023 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
